snippet.title: Super Luigi Trick Or Treat - Trailer
snippet.description:
Yes, I'm making a mod for this halloween, since in the last few years we had the other and the other and although the pumpkin boneyard is not a mod made for halloween I consider it so this year I wanted to make a mod for this halloween, and I'm trying to do my best to get it to release on the 31st, I hope you like it this will be my first nsmbu mod to be released, and I will polish it until release so that there are no level design errors or very visible tilling errors, cya guys.

Super Luigi Trick Or Treat!

- The Mod Contains:

New Levels
New Tilesets
New Backgrounds
Modified Worldmap
Custom Music
And more.

Logo made by: @cooltoadmovies 
Trailer music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0CHDD_bpM8

- The channel of my friends who are also helping:

Melzy: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvdPrye4V6jgHWlXbPr7kgQ
CoolMarioMovies: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpgYDs7OFaZW9OS39W2qY0A
Baron: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEMWkqvqfmxWQ24AXE-k2GA

im not affiliated with Nintendo, Mario, Luigi, Toad, etc are the property of nintendo
I can't stand piracy, and this mod is for WIIU! It's not for wii, it's not for switch, it's not for another type of platform, but it can also be played via emulator: https://cemu.info/
